context: Playwright 1.17 introduces [frame locators](/docs/api/class-framelocator) \- a locator to the iframe on the page. Frame locators capture the logic sufficient to retrieve the `iframe` and then locate elements in that iframe. Frame locators are strict by default, will wait for `iframe` to appear and can be used in Web-First assertions. | Frame locators can be created with either [page.frameLocator()](/docs/api/class-page#page-frame-locator) or [locator.frameLocator()](/docs/api/class-locator#locator-frame-locator) method.
